metadata.name: 2142 Issue1 - Cover
metadata.description: 2142 is the world’s first community-driven NFT comic book based on DAO philosophy, where YOU decide what will happen and how it will end by voting, collecting, and crafting. Discover the post-cyberpunk story where mysterious Satoshi’s wallet activates for the first time to purge the planet from mega-corps and Metaverse brand sects, while entheogen spirits rise to awaken humanity and stand-up against legions of chaotic entities beyond space and time.
